title: antsRegistrationSyN.sh
description: Script for simplified symmetric image registration using ANTs.

image_dimension.title: Image Dimension
image_dimension.description: Image dimension: 2 or 3 (for 2 or 3-dimensional registration of a single volume)

fixed_image.title: Fixed Image
fixed_image.description: Fixed image(s) or source image(s) or reference image(s)

output_prefix.title: Output Prefix
output_prefix.description: A prefix that is prepended to all output files

threads.title: Number of Threads
threads.description: Number of threads (default = ITK_GLOBAL_DEFAULT_NUMBER_OF_THREADS if defined, otherwise 1)

initial_transform.title: Initial Transform
initial_transform.description: Initial transform(s) --- order specified on the command line matters

transform_type.title: Transform Type
transform_type.description:
Transform type (default = 's'). Options:
 - t: translation (1 stage)
 - r: rigid (1 stage)
 - a: rigid + affine (2 stages)
 - s: rigid + affine + deformable syn (3 stages)
 - sr: rigid + deformable syn (2 stages)
 - so: deformable syn only (1 stage)
 - b: rigid + affine + deformable b-spline syn (3 stages)
 - br: rigid + deformable b-spline syn (2 stages)
 - bo: deformable b-spline syn only (1 stage)

radius.title: Radius for Cross Correlation Metric
radius.description: Radius for cross correlation metric used during SyN stage (default = 4)

spline_distance.title: Spline Distance for Deformable B-spline SyN Transform
spline_distance.description: Spline distance for deformable B-spline SyN transform (default = 26)

gradient_step.title: Gradient Step Size for SyN and B-spline SyN
gradient_step.description: Gradient step size for SyN and B-spline SyN (default = 0.1)

masks.title: Masks
masks.description: Mask(s) for the fixed image space, or for the fixed and moving image space in the format 'fixedMask,MovingMask'. Use -x once to specify mask(s) to be used for all stages or use -x for each 'stage' (cf -t option). If no mask is to be used for a particular stage, the keyword 'NULL' should be used in place of file names.

precision_type.title: Precision Type
precision_type.description:
Precision type (default = 'd'). Options:
 - f: float
 - d: double

use_histogram_matching.title: Use Histogram Matching
use_histogram_matching.description:
Use histogram matching (default = 0). Options:
 - 0: false
 - 1: true

use_repro_mode.title: Use 'Repro' Mode for Exact Reproducibility
use_repro_mode.description:
Use 'repro' mode for exact reproducibility of output. Uses GC metric for linear stages and a fixed random seed (default = 0). Options:
 - 0: false
 - 1: true

collapse_output_transforms.title: Collapse Output Transforms
collapse_output_transforms.description:
Collapse output transforms (default = 1). Options:
 - 0: false
 - 1: true

random_seed.title: Random Seed
random_seed.description: Fix random seed to an int value
